maincourse.name: The Caesar
maincourse.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with our homemade Caesar dressing, croutons, and shredded parmesan cheese.

maincourse.name: Surf & Turf
maincourse.description: A grilled, queen-cut ribeye served with shrimp and scallop alfredo.

maincourse.name: Creamy Sage
maincourse.description: Chicken breast sautéed with fresh sage and prosciutto. Served atop creamy asiago linguini.

maincourse.name: From the Sea
maincourse.description: Fresh haddock, gulf shrimp, and sea scallops dipped in beer batter and fried to a golden brown.

maincourse.name: BB's Tenderloin
maincourse.description: Tenderloin tips, sautéed with bacon and mushrooms and finished with a bourbon-BBQ sauce.

maincourse.name: Chicken Marsala
maincourse.description: Boneless chicken breast sautéed with mushrooms and finished in a marsala and cream reduction.
